channel.title: [508] Help (Npc)

item.title: [508] Help (Npc)
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

[code]if(pnp.npcType == 6798)
{
if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 6010, 1) || Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 1955, 1) || Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 225, 1) || Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 5972, 1))
{
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,6010, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 995), 1000);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,1955, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 995), 1250);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,225, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 995), 1500);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,5972, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 995), 2000);
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 6798, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Praying Mantis”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ooh, yummy, dirty, plant life!!”, 241, 4);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, " The Praying Mantis Quickly Snatches your Plant Life.");
}
else {p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 6798, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Praying Mantis”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Ew, you don’t have any plant life, No Shiny gold for you. *Hiss!”, 241, 4);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, " The Praying Mantis will trade Gold for:");
p.frames.sendMessage(p, " Marigolds, Limpwurt Roots, Cooking Apples, or Papaya’s.");}
}

[/code]

This is supposed to work…but it doesn’t.
Can anyone spot out my wrong doings please?

Read full topic
